verses.name: Genesis 3:4
verses.text: And the serpent said unto the woman, Ye shall not surely die:

verses.name: Genesis 3:5
verses.text: For God doth know that in the day ye eat thereof, then your eyes shall be opened, and ye shall be as gods, knowing good and evil.

verses.name: Genesis 3:6
verses.text: And when the woman saw that the tree was good for food, and that it was pleasant to the eyes, and a tree to be desired to make one wise, she took of the fruit thereof, and did eat, and gave also unto her husband with her; and he did eat.
